thread.title: The New "Harry Potter" Spin-Off Book Covers Are Here
thread.title_full: The New "Harry Potter" Spin-Off Book Covers Are Here

author: Elizabeth Lilly
title: The New "Harry Potter" Spin-Off Book Covers Are Here
text:
We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page. ID: 10374957 2. Has pulling a Hermione Granger to dig in to all of the Harry Potter references in the Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them movie left your Hogwarts books ragged? View this image ›
Warner Bros. / Via youtube.com ID: 10366073 3. Newt Scamander fans will be pleased to learn that you can get fresh copies of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them , Quidditch Through the Ages , and The Tales of Beedle The Bard sporting ~new~ covers that are due out March 14, 2017. ID: 10366091 4. Even better news… They’re available for pre-order now. Check ‘em out below: ID: 10366138 5. A winding tentacle and antennae-d creature beckon from the cover of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them . View this image ›
amazon.com Pre-order it from Amazon for $7.38 (hardcover).
ID: 10365994 6. The timeless cover design of Quidditch Through the Ages is nearly as alluring as a within-reach golden snitch. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $7.97 (hardcover).
ID: 10366002 7. And the The Tales of Beedle The Bard cover’s skulls hint at something much more sinister than a kid’s bedtime story. View this image ›
store.scholastic.com Get it from The Scholastic Store for $9.09 (hardcover).
ID: 10366023 8. Or, opt for all three new editions in a Hogwarts Library box. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $23.91 .
ID: 10366047 9. So what’s a fan to do to pass the time ‘til March 14th? We have an idea…. View this image ›
Warner Bros. ID: 10366115
